ValidationRule.description: Only allow letters and numbers in Animal Name for new records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(REGEX(animalos__Animal_Name__c, "^[a-zA-Z0-9 ]*$")) ), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(animalos__Animal_Name__c), NOT(REGEX(animalos__Animal_Name__c, "^[a-zA-Z0-9 ]*$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Animal Name can only contain letters and numbers, no special characters
